nodes.documentation:
Campaign contract created for every new campaign, by invoking the createCampaign(args..)
in CampaignFactory. Caller of createCamapign will be the manager of the Campign instance.
nodes.name: Campaign

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to check if the backer has contributed
nodes.name: validBacker

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to check if deadline has passed and the campaign has reached its goal
nodes.name: postDeadline

nodes.documentation: @dev Constructor to create a Campaign
@dev Payable function recieve funds from backers
nodes.name: contribute

nodes.documentation: @dev Function to withdraw funds from the campaign
nodes.name: withdraw

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Campaign.Request storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.name: createRequest

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Campaign.Request storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:
@dev Backers of the campaign can approve the request
@param index Index of the request for approval
nodes.name: approveRequest

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Campaign.Request storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:
@dev Finalizing the request for funds if more than 50% of the backers approve
@param index Index of the request for approval
nodes.name: finalizeRequest

nodes.documentation: @dev Owner can activate the refund flag
nodes.name: refundBackerFunds
